PageTitle: load-balancing med-ignore(BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view/BGP-IPv6 unicast address family view)
FuncDef:
The load-balancing med-ignore command configures a device not to compare the MEDs of routes when selecting routes for load balancing.
The undo load-balancing med-ignore command restores the default configuration. The load-balancing med-ignore command configures a device not to compare the MEDs of routes when selecting routes for load balancing. The undo load-balancing med-ignore command restores the default configuration. By default, a router compares the MED attributes of the routes to be used for load balancing.
ParentView: BGP-IPv4 unicast address family view,BGP-IPv6 unicast address family view
